pages.text: The savanna is a dry grassland biome. It is home to the $(l:world/tree)acacia tree$(), though oak trees can spawn as well. Rain is not a thing here.$(br2)Special acacia variants of the $(l:structures/village)village$() and the $(l:structures/outpost)outpost$() can spawn. $(br2)The usual monsters and animals spawn.
This biome has four subtypes: normal, hills, modified and modified hills.
